meanings.definition: Unable to be defeated or overcome.
meanings.sent1: The champion boxer was unbeatable in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team's defense was unbeatable throughout the season.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle was so easy, it was almost unbeatable.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an unbeatable force pushing her forward.
meanings.sent5: The fortress stood tall and unbeatable against any attack.

meanings.definition: Having no equal; surpassing all others.
meanings.sent1: The chef's signature dish was unbeatable in taste.
meanings.sent2: The team's chemistry on the field was unbeatable.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream was truly unbeatable.
meanings.sent4: The view from the mountaintop was an unbeatable sight.
meanings.sent5: The bond between the siblings was unbeatable, unbreakable.
